about_the_game:
[THIS IS A GAMEPLAY DEMO FOR KAMLA]

You are a priest who is performing an exorcism to cure a newly wed woman currently possessed by a demon. Solve puzzles and find items to perform a ritual in this SURVIVAL HORROR set in 1980's INDIA.

- Welcome to Kamla's House -

Set in 1980's India, Kamla was recently married into a rich family with a mansion full of mysteries to uncover and stories to unfold. Just a year later she has lost her sanity and killed people in the family and is now waiting for help.

- Kamla -

After losing her sanity because of the demonic possession, Kamla has already killed few people and now haunts the mansion walking around, you must find her and help her.

- The Ritual -

You are an Indian priest with prowess in black magic, also known as a "Tantrik". You must find objects required in your recipe to exorcise kamla near the holy fire, These recipe items have unique values and are scattered around the house in different ways. some easy to get and some hidden behind obstacles and puzzles.

❑ Solve puzzles to clear obstacles and unlock items.



❑ Evade kamla when she is angry, find places to hide and dont lose collected items!



❑ Collect these items in the holy fire and say the final prayer to finish the exorcism.



Kamla provides a tense atmophospheric thrill for the ones who love a little scare, we hope you get in there and fix kamla as soon as possible!
